text: Poothumbiyum Poovalanmarum is a 1997 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Francis and starring Prem Kumar and Vani Viswanath. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar as SI Podiyan Chettiyar * Premkumar as Pavithran * Harisree Ashokan as Charlie * Vani Viswanath as Nanditha *Baiju as Hyder *Jagannatha Varma as Dr Sooryanarayanan *K. T. S. Padannayil as Naduvathu Narayana pilla *Gayathri as Subadra *K. K. Rajeev as Sudhakaran *Salim Kumar as Gonsalvas Sayippu *Shaju as Unni *Vijayakumar as George Manavalan *Rajan P. Dev as Mahendra Varma *Mahesh as Freddy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Poothumbiyum Poovalanmarum
